rukus.text: tae yeung minban baekchamh troung robsa anak( mou ham meat) aoy anak
ning ban dk bantouk robsa anak chenhpi anak
del ban phtok yeang thngon now leu khnang robsa anak
haey yeung ban leuk ke tde neam robsa anak aoy khpangkhpasa te ryy
haey pitabrakd nasa cheamuoynung sechakdei lombak vetnea ku pheap ngeayosruol
pitabrakd nasa cheamuoynung se ch kei d lombak vetnea ku pheap ngeayosruol
dau che neah nowpel del anak ban bampenhphearkechch(kechchakar lokey) ruochreal haey chaur anak khetkham korp sakkar champoh yeung
haey tow champoh mcheasa robsa anak temuoyokt chaur anak bng brathnea ning sangkhum
